title: amended by section 181 of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 30 of 2022)) of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order amends the European Parliament Election (Reimbursement of 
Expenses) Regulations 1999 (S.I. No. 122 of 1999) to provide for the 
reimbursement to a candidate at a European Parliament election of his/her 
actual expenses incurred or €64,400 whichever is the less, subject to fulfilling 
the criteria prescribed in Regulation 3(a) of the aforesaid Regulations. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [133] 

€ 1.50
